verses.content: Samuel chu a hung upa tah a, a naupasalhai chu Israel mihai chunga rorêltuhaiah a siem a.
A nau lutir hming chu Joel a na, chun, a dawttu hming chu Abija a nih; anni chu Beer-sebaa rorêltu an na.
Nisienlakhawm, a nauhai chun a umdân chu an lâk ve nawh a, sum le pai tieng an hnawt a, thamnahai an lâk a, indik nawtakin ro an rêl a.
Chuongchun, Israel mi upahai po po chu an inkhâwm a, Rama khuoa Samuel kuomah an feh a,
a kuomah, “Ngai ta, i hung upa ta hle el a, i naupasalhai hlak chun i umdân hi an lâk ve dêr si nawh a; hnam danghai po po ang bawka kan chunga ro mi rêlpêk dingin lal mi siempêk raw khai,” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, a kuoma, “Ro mi rêlpêktu ding lal mi pe rawh,” an ti chun Samuel chu a suklâwm naw hleh a. Chuongchun, Samuel chu LALPA kuomah a ṭawngṭai a.
LALPA chun Samuel kuoma chun, “Mipuihaiin i kuoma an hril po po chu ngai rawh, nang dit naw che an ni nawh a; an chunga lal dinga kei mi dit lo an ni lem.
Aigupta rama inthawka ka ṭhuoi suok nia tuta chena an thil thaw dân po po, an mi nghatsan a, pathien danghai rawng dâm an mi bâwlsan hlak ang bawk hin i chungah an thaw a ni hi.
Chuleiin, an thu ngai rawh, amiruokchu, ursûntaka tiemkamin an chunga rorêltu lal châng dân ding chu khîkhmu chie rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Samuel chun LALPA thuhai po po chu lal hnitu mipuihai chu a hril vawng a.
“In chunga rorêltu lal châng dân ding chu hieng ang hi nîng a tih: in naupasalhai chu a sakawr le a tawlailîr chuongpuia hai ruot a ta, a tawlailîr hmaa tlânhai dâm um an ta;
chun, a sipai sâng hotua dâm, sâwmnga hotua dâm ruot a tih; ṭhenkhat chu a hnuoi inlettua dâm, a busîktua dâm, a indo thuomhnaw siemtua dâm, tawlailîr hmangruo siemtua dâm hmang a ta.
In naunuhmeihai chu rimin- hnik siemtua dâm, bu suongtua dâm, bei siemtua dâm hmang a tih.
In lohai, in grêp huonhai, oliv huonhai, a ṭha ṭhahai chu lâkpêk a ti cheu a, a siehlawhai pêng a tih.
In thlai chi le in grêp huonhaia mi chu sâwma pakhat lâkpêk a ti cheu a, a siehlawhai le a hotuhai pêng a tih.
In siehlawpahai, in siehlaw- nuhai, in tlangvâl ṭha ṭhahai le in sabengtunghai lâkpêk a ti cheu a, a sinthaw dingin ruoi a tih.
In berâm ruol laia mi chu sâwma pakhat lâkpêk a ti cheu a; chun, ama siehlawhai nîng in tih.
Chun, chu nia chun in la thlang ding in lal lei chun la khêk suok in ta, nisienlakhawm, chu nia chun LALPAIN dawn naw ni cheu,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, mipuihai chun Samuel rawl chu an ngai nuom nawh a, “Ni lo e, lal kan nei ding a nih,
chuongchun, hnam dang po pohai ang hung nîng kan ta, chun, kan lal chun ro mi rêlpêk a ta, kan hmahai chu ṭhuoiin râlhai mi dopui a tih,” an ta.
Chun, Samuel chun mipui thuhrilhai po po chu a hriet a, LALPA naa chun a thun nâwk sâwng a.
Chun, LALPA chun Samuel kuomah, “An rawl chu ngai la, lal siempêk rawh,” a ta. Chun, Samuel chun Israel mihai kuomah, “Mi tin mâni khuo sengah fe ta ro,” a ta.
